articles.title: The MAHA plan for healthier kids includes 128 ideas, but few details - NPR
articles.description: The Make America Healthy Again commission is proposing more than 100 moves to address the root causes of childhood chronic disease. Critics say other Trump administration moves contradict the goals.
articles.content: The Trump administration released a report Tuesday outlining a broad strategy to improve children's health. It calls for a wide range of executive actions and policy reforms aimed at tackling a rise … [+7600 chars]
